featured.text: They may also pretend to be 14 customers, arguing with a salesperson without a good reason.
Later children may make good salespersons because persuasion may have been the only tool they had to deal with older siblings.

definition.zh_def: 銷售人員，負責推銷產品或服務並與顧客互動的人。
definition.en_def: A person whose job is to sell products or services and interact with customers.
definition.example: The salesperson helped me find the perfect laptop for my needs.
